name: Unstabled (Euix)
description:
Oh no! A tornado has ripped through town and caused havoc! It hit the stable and the fireworks factory! Now the stable is at the top of a mountain! And all the horses accidentally ate fireworks! Save the horses by getting them out of the stable, but don’t let them touch each other or they will explode!

Unstabled is a game about unstabling unstable horses from an unstable stable.

20 LEVELS OF NON-STOP HORSE ACTION

Developed by Robert Ramsay, Brandon Peterman, Peter Fenner, and Chris Hutchinson for Ludum Dare 49.

## Controls

KeyFunctionA / D
Tilt level
SpacebarBump levelW / S
Move Camera
RReset current level
ESC / F1
Open MenuBackslash (\)
Unlock all levels
